creator: marekst@exigengroup.lv
text:
I deleted jsp cache from webserver - <tomcat install 
dir>/work/standalone/localhost/<my webapp>
Then I launched tomcat and opened one page and got following error:


HTTP Status 500 - 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

message 

description The server encountered an internal error () that prevented it from 
fulfilling this request.

-------------------------------------
after reloading of this page it didnt show error anymore. I searched web for 
this problem and found a couple of entries in discussion groups where people 
were having similar problems, but had no answer how to solve this.

To quote craig from bug 425 "...such errors are normally caused by making an 
incompatible API change in one class, without recompiling all of the classes 
that call methods on the changed class."

Deleting a class would certainly be an "incompatible API change". On this 
basis I am going to resolve this on as invalid. If you believe this is wrong 
and re-open this bug report, a ready to deploy war (with source code) that 
demonstrates the issue would be very helpful.
creator: markt@apache.org
